entry.title: Battling Procastination
entry.content:
• Pay close attention to how your resolve fades
  • Plan for procrastination attacks by controlled indulging
    • “If you choosing pressure-release moments ahead of time… You are more likely to snap back faster”
  • Meditation

entry.title: How The Power Of Habit Helps With Dieting
entry.content:
• Figure out what causes over-eating
  • Weigh your self every morning
  • Plan for slip-ups
  • Eating healthy breakfast morning
  • small wins
  • Take unexpected rewards
